description: Weight of binary expansion of n + length of binary expansion of n.
links: R. Stephan, Table of generating functions
Index to sequences related to the complexity of n
formula: a(n) = a((n - n mod 2) / (2 - n mod 2)) + 1 for n>0, a(0)=1. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 29 2002a(2n) = a(n)+1, a(2n+1) = a(n)+2. G.f.: 1 + 1/(1-x) * sum(k>=0, (2t+t^2)/(1+t), t=x^2^k). For n>0, a(n) = 2*A000120(n) + A080791(n) = A000120(n) + A029837(n). - _Ralf Stephan_, Jun 14 2003a(n)=sum_{i>=0} 2^b(i) where n=sum_{i>=0} b(i)*2^e(i)is the representation of n. [From _Juri-Stepan Gerasimov_, Jun 06 2010]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 01 2000
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Sep 06 2000 and from _David W. Wilson_, Sep 07, 2000
